name: Brian
body:
Thanks for this post! It was really interesting to me since I evaluated some of the same platforms recently. I ended up going with Postgraphile for the backend and am happy with it so far. We're planning to deploy it serverless, and are using NextJS for the frontend. I also am using Clerk for auth, that is a great new service and recommended!

I'd be interested in how it went, please consider posting a reflection on your experiences after having implemented this stack amd run it for a while!
